mapper.select: SELECT recipe_no, recipe_type, recipe_name, recipe_reg_dt, recipe_like, recipe_view_cnt FROM RECIPE WHERE recipe_del != 'Y' ORDER BY recipe_reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{end} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE recipe_del != 'Y'

select r.recipe_no , r.recipe_type , r.recipe_name , r.recipe_reg_dt , r.recipe_file_name , r.recipe_person , r.recipe_tip , r.recipe_explanation , rd.recipe_detail_step , rd.recipe_detail_content , rd.recipe_detail_image_name , a.file_path from RECIPE r left outer join RECIPE_DETAIL rd on r.recipe_no = rd.recipe_no left outer join ATTACHEMENT a on rd.recipe_detail_image_name = a.file_chage_name where r.recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
select recipe_no , recipe_etc , recipe_etc_ingredient , recipe_etc_quantity , recipe_etc_type from RECIPE_ETC where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
mapper.update: update RECIPE set recipe_del = 'Y' where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
